details.top:
"If you hear the crow of a rooster, ask Allaah for his bounty for it has seen an angel and if you hear the braying of an ass, seek refuge in Allaah for it has seen a devil." [1] 

Also

"If you hear the barking of dogs or the braying of asses at night, seek refuge in Allaah for they see what you do not." [2]
details.translations: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan the outcast.

pageTitle: Upon hearing a rooster crow, ass bray or dogs barking
